86c43c9cf20a2bf9.content: You are who you are, and no one can change that. So be yourself, because no one can do it better.
86c43c9cf20a2bf9.author: Meylin D. Bojorge

d844e04deab98353.content: The greatest analgesic, soporific, stimulant, tranquilizer, narcotic, and to some extent even antibiotic --in short, the closest thing to a genuine panacea --known to medical science is work.
d844e04deab98353.author: Thomas Szasz

bab628df0e9e08fd.content: I believe that every right implies a responsibility every opportunity an obligation every possession a duty.
bab628df0e9e08fd.author: John Davidson Rockefeller, Sr.

8c910dc85280400d.content: Of men who have a sense of honor, more come through alive than are slain, but from those who flee comes neither glory nor any help.
8c910dc85280400d.author: Homer

fd9055f275c139db.content: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
fd9055f275c139db.author: Shirley MacLaine

d2e76478c0248411.content: I can't listen to that much Wagner. I start getting the urge to conquer Poland.
d2e76478c0248411.author: Woody Allen

db072bbfd1865b6a.content: Interestingly, according to modern astronomers, space is finite. This is a very comforting thought-- particularly for people who can never remember where they have left things.
db072bbfd1865b6a.author: Woody Allen

4b09227ae6168039.content: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while.
4b09227ae6168039.author: Albert Einstein

3eb9e1a5ed46db98.content: There is no way to happiness, happiness is the way.
3eb9e1a5ed46db98.author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

b5ff3702a8abeee7.content: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
b5ff3702a8abeee7.author: Confucius

5d49ad5be23222a1.content: You'll see it when you believe it.
5d49ad5be23222a1.author: Wayne Dyer

e244c46a87273443.content: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
e244c46a87273443.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

0fd429bca22e755d.content: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement - that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
0fd429bca22e755d.author: Sigmund Freud

4c324315eb64e2d8.content: We live in a society bloated with data yet starved for wisdom. We're connected 24/7, yet anxiety, fear, depression and loneliness are at an all-time high. We must course-correct.
4c324315eb64e2d8.author: Elizabeth Kapu'uwailani Lindsey

83ceb70532c8e100.content: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
83ceb70532c8e100.author: Benjamin Disraeli

1149f124b87051d1.content: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
1149f124b87051d1.author: Dale Carnegie

0a6b86d422b8c2ba.content: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
0a6b86d422b8c2ba.author: Archimedes

5528896e025325ad.content: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.
5528896e025325ad.author: Henri Bergson

36eb47b2d24a9f65.content: Step with care and great tact and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act.
36eb47b2d24a9f65.author: Dr. Seuss

0946cfab4d9f57cf.content: Opportunity often comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat.
0946cfab4d9f57cf.author: Napoleon Hill

7e848385d99d1313.content: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
7e848385d99d1313.author: Oprah Winfrey

7425c710db7db600.content: You can stand tall without standing on someone. You can be a victor without having victims.
7425c710db7db600.author: Harriet Woods

4a39209967c4c776.content: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong gives it a superficial appearance of being right.
4a39209967c4c776.author: Thomas Paine

61b437ec997b91d9.content: Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend.
61b437ec997b91d9.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

e55997dd0bd90f96.content: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
e55997dd0bd90f96.author: Max Planck

21844f73b88397d3.content: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
21844f73b88397d3.author: Hubert Humphrey

bd25027e605ac1bc.content: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
bd25027e605ac1bc.author: Helen Keller

1357c25308a38767.content: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
1357c25308a38767.author: Thomas Edison

97c092f6cd899aab.content: The older I get the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first. A process which often reduces the most complex human problem to a manageable proportion.
97c092f6cd899aab.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

9424a9765a9f625b.content: The past has no power to stop you from being present now. Only your grievance about the past can do that.
9424a9765a9f625b.author: Eckhart Tolle

e3fa875133988d62.content: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
e3fa875133988d62.author: Buddha

c5d4a08389dc46dc.content: To lead people walk behind them.
c5d4a08389dc46dc.author: Laozi

df295ea9e7e5cd3e.content: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.
df295ea9e7e5cd3e.author: Viktor Frankl

33009aec803529e1.content: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
33009aec803529e1.author: Richard Bach

3918e03d5a6aee7b.content: If you don't know where you are going, you will probably end up somewhere else.
3918e03d5a6aee7b.author: Laurence J. Peter

967ebc08c1efb3b4.content: The Universal Zulu Nation stands to acknowledge wisdom, understanding, freedom, justice, and equality, peace, unity, love, and having fun, work, overcoming the negative through the positive, science, mathematics, faith, facts, and the wonders of God, whether we call him Allah, Jehovah, Yahweh, or Jah.
967ebc08c1efb3b4.author: Afrika Bambaataa

cdeb5a94808ab159.content: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
cdeb5a94808ab159.author: Joan Rivers

08c40e9d01754441.content: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
08c40e9d01754441.author: Wayne Dyer

4e841a4caa498d14.content: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
4e841a4caa498d14.author: Virginia Woolf

4de1ccb3a8082516.content: The most successful people are those who are good at plan B.
4de1ccb3a8082516.author: James A. Yorke

5642801f5eb10054.content: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not yet been discovered.
5642801f5eb10054.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

d891a9fde2ce1801.content: You were not born a winner, and you were not born a loser. You are what you make yourself be.
d891a9fde2ce1801.author: Lou Holtz

03468a966608df49.content: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
03468a966608df49.author: George Bernard Shaw

b805dcef076c85fc.content: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
b805dcef076c85fc.author: Benjamin Franklin

b69121b6516fcbf6.content: We know what we are but know not what we may be.
b69121b6516fcbf6.author: William Shakespeare

f5c9dd7c4fc79ee9.content: I have learned that friendship isn't about who you've known the longest, it's about who came and never left your side.
f5c9dd7c4fc79ee9.author: Yolanda Hadid

c0d2d0b59afb88c0.content: I care not so much what I am to others as what I am to myself. I will be rich by myself, and not by borrowing.
c0d2d0b59afb88c0.author: Michel de Montaigne

b733d0bffe979e66.content: Consider that not only do negative thoughts and emotions destroy our experience of peace, but they also undermine our health.
b733d0bffe979e66.author: Dalai Lama

a76b4d017974ed3a.content: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
a76b4d017974ed3a.author: George S. Patton

894180a747522233.content: Those who will play with cats must expect to be scratched.
894180a747522233.author: Miguel de Cervantes

6b233acdae0fbfce.content: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
6b233acdae0fbfce.author: Oprah Winfrey

fc9eb63519e976ff.content: I think somehow, we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.
fc9eb63519e976ff.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

cef473af3bc853fd.content: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
cef473af3bc853fd.author: Henry van Dyke Jr.

56fc6bf1a815880e.content: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
56fc6bf1a815880e.author: Margaret Fuller

511c9d3e3250a7f7.content: Arriving at one point is the starting point to another.
511c9d3e3250a7f7.author: John Dewey

e46a6bb85086e69e.content: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy.
e46a6bb85086e69e.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

becfd56190e35894.content: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.
becfd56190e35894.author: Chanakya

454417c6e355d051.content: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of oneself, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
454417c6e355d051.author: Joseph Addison

241bfb063b81d160.content: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?
241bfb063b81d160.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

26be3093019d2f45.content: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
26be3093019d2f45.author: Aristotle

2f5ea067914bc223.content: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
2f5ea067914bc223.author: Thornton Wilder

b42b359fcd53ec61.content: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
b42b359fcd53ec61.author: Confucius

caee826497adf423.content: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just to realize them.
caee826497adf423.author: Man Ray

a5d2db3b2f7cf787.content: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can.
a5d2db3b2f7cf787.author: Neil Gaiman

79c8db1c22245220.content: What matters is the value we've created in our lives, the people we've made happy and how much we've grown as people.
79c8db1c22245220.author: Daisaku Ikeda

4f575b0ca95f3f7f.content: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
4f575b0ca95f3f7f.author: William Shakespeare

26377d37e7a4d15f.content: I think and that is all that I am.
26377d37e7a4d15f.author: Wayne Dyer

57ac3092103a8931.content: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
57ac3092103a8931.author: Kahlil Gibran

46a8c82bb518f8dc.content: We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything.
46a8c82bb518f8dc.author: Blaise Pascal

12047eba5fa37d51.content: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
12047eba5fa37d51.author: Edith Wharton

d3ebe950c94d453d.content: Always keep your mind as bright and clear as the vast sky, the great ocean, and the highest peak, empty of all thoughts. Always keep your body filled with light and heat. Fill yourself with the power of wisdom and enlightenment.
d3ebe950c94d453d.author: Morihei Ueshiba

9875c42f2c8cd077.content: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
9875c42f2c8cd077.author: Mike Ditka

f4b01eb92df847c7.content: The pine stays green in winter... wisdom in hardship.
f4b01eb92df847c7.author: Norman Douglas

40f17eb30aef7061.content: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves.
40f17eb30aef7061.author: Carl Jung

f464d77e10da6e11.content: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
f464d77e10da6e11.author: William Shakespeare

6de833dee67616e6.content: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
6de833dee67616e6.author: Milton Berle

d1fc345dcfc479fe.content: One today is worth two tomorrows.
d1fc345dcfc479fe.author: Benjamin Franklin

360e80f4397a6b7e.content: We make our own fortunes and we call them fate.
360e80f4397a6b7e.author: Benjamin Disraeli

9c162320eab3f088.content: Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.
9c162320eab3f088.author: Dalai Lama

5524b864e29d30d6.content: Take no thought of who is right or wrong or who is better than. Be not for or against.
5524b864e29d30d6.author: Bruce Lee

4a226cd580d38a4b.content: I believe that every person is born with talent.
4a226cd580d38a4b.author: Maya Angelou

324272d6ac0a8c66.content: Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom.
324272d6ac0a8c66.author: Bodhidharma

b59a664935d579e2.content: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
b59a664935d579e2.author: Laozi

8ec7743134685969.content: If it turns out that there is a God, I don't think that he's evil. But the worst that you can say about him is that basically he's an underachiever.
8ec7743134685969.author: Woody Allen

1baec30d38d0e36a.content: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
1baec30d38d0e36a.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

50696a6679df665e.content: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
50696a6679df665e.author: Buddha

49c1f19c4c0dc85f.content: We do not quit playing because we grow old, we grow old because we quit playing.
49c1f19c4c0dc85f.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

18fe3fc5636dfab2.content: Men in general judge more from appearances than from reality. All men have eyes, but few have the gift of penetration.
18fe3fc5636dfab2.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

4ec2ca916ec1b6b6.content: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
4ec2ca916ec1b6b6.author: Lou Holtz

b031cd20b42e6182.content: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
b031cd20b42e6182.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

bc7ccd48b2de70b3.content: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of the imagination.
bc7ccd48b2de70b3.author: John Dewey

f3599f517cd3fd25.content: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
f3599f517cd3fd25.author: Mahatma Gandhi

91838de86cfd488f.content: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
91838de86cfd488f.author: Cynthia Ozick

cbd8d528585b2ca7.content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
cbd8d528585b2ca7.author: Mark Twain

a8eb5b25d71e5958.content: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
a8eb5b25d71e5958.author: Voltaire

1c59338fcf960b94.content: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
1c59338fcf960b94.author: Buddha

fba084fdb3551c5e.content: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
fba084fdb3551c5e.author: Tony Robbins

834ed2596697e203.content: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
834ed2596697e203.author: Carl Sandburg

5a08e97cc1cf82f9.content: We know the truth, not only by the reason, but by the heart.
5a08e97cc1cf82f9.author: Blaise Pascal

e0f1a8d120ef0892.content: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
e0f1a8d120ef0892.author: Larry Elder

328cd01d129f3cd0.content: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.
328cd01d129f3cd0.author: Harvey Mackay

cf22ff363fa95bfd.content: To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
cf22ff363fa95bfd.author: William Shakespeare

30620c302ba5df77.content: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
30620c302ba5df77.author: Confucius

3af17b4af3e4d4a3.content: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
3af17b4af3e4d4a3.author: Ovid

142487e619be4cd6.content: Wisdom cannot come by railroad or automobile or airplane or be hurried up by telegraph or telephone.
142487e619be4cd6.author: John Burroughs

963eba26f1e05605.content: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
963eba26f1e05605.author: Bruce Lee

ab3da948b726775b.content: Do not turn back when you are just at the goal.
ab3da948b726775b.author: Publilius Syrus

063e1859387f2139.content: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
063e1859387f2139.author: Buddha

9ca9abf56144a1d8.content: Three things in human life are important. The first is to be kind. The second is to be kind. The third is to be kind.
9ca9abf56144a1d8.author: Henry James

71efd8040fafc5b3.content: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
71efd8040fafc5b3.author: Laurie Anderson

291bb1e3417f34ce.content: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
291bb1e3417f34ce.author: Albert Einstein

88ea53c7fd41ae95.content: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.
88ea53c7fd41ae95.author: Laozi

2d6efde63acb1adf.content: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
2d6efde63acb1adf.author: Joseph Stalin

80379ea127083539.content: Accept the things to which fate binds you and love the people with whom fate brings you together but do so with all your heart.
80379ea127083539.author: Marcus Aurelius

605edf1aa7ad8668.content: There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart.
605edf1aa7ad8668.author: Charles Dickens

2a4e23d4c42f89d9.content: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in; external situations cause internal friction; you grow apart and then bounce back together.
2a4e23d4c42f89d9.author: Mariella Frostrup

ecaacfc361aacb4a.content: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
ecaacfc361aacb4a.author: Abraham Lincoln

338c41ea36b84a4a.content: A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
338c41ea36b84a4a.author: Chuck Norris

7e5e40008d500cc6.content: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind.
7e5e40008d500cc6.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

a58474fc930d4a81.content: All things must come to the soul from its roots, from where it is planted.
a58474fc930d4a81.author: Teresa of Ávila

dcd286c30b45e7b8.content: Genuine sincerity opens people's hearts, while manipulation causes them to close.
dcd286c30b45e7b8.author: Daisaku Ikeda

0bed1f5321843244.content: Happiness mainly comes from our own attitude, rather than from external factors.
0bed1f5321843244.author: Dalai Lama

f6f5bbeef6f09ec9.content: All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man.
f6f5bbeef6f09ec9.author: Henry David Thoreau

247462469115e98a.content: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
247462469115e98a.author: John C. Maxwell

08c88c4a5c959648.content: Ignorant men don't know what good they hold in their hands until they've flung it away.
08c88c4a5c959648.author: Sophocles

a72eccc4b2ba584a.content: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
a72eccc4b2ba584a.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

bb5f0a69c7445f91.content: If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?
bb5f0a69c7445f91.author: Confucius

784cd7f6e5272169.content: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were.
784cd7f6e5272169.author: Richard Bach

c759ff8cf455fb9b.content: The truth you believe and cling to makes you unavailable to hear anything new.
c759ff8cf455fb9b.author: Pema Chödrön

4585dc7ee531123e.content: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
4585dc7ee531123e.author: Marcel Proust

ec182410dabc3b79.content: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
ec182410dabc3b79.author: Doris Day

462bcbc08266ec05.content: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
462bcbc08266ec05.author: Ernie Banks

b6e1fe7e4594ab48.content: There are no failures. Just experiences and your reactions to them.
b6e1fe7e4594ab48.author: Tom Krause

0087c3f1092e56f5.content: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
0087c3f1092e56f5.author: William Arthur Ward

10a1d2e5724ada02.content: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
10a1d2e5724ada02.author: Dalai Lama

71e5caec92fbba1d.content: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.
71e5caec92fbba1d.author: Annie Dillard

cc11b45f12d9c430.content: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
cc11b45f12d9c430.author: Oscar Wilde

1622f53c151d02da.content: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
1622f53c151d02da.author: Amy Poehler

276601e13ffbf964.content: O, what a tangled web we weave when first we practice to deceive!
276601e13ffbf964.author: Walter Scott

12f8719e13ec43f9.content: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
12f8719e13ec43f9.author: Michel de Montaigne

7a361cdae6c76f99.content: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
7a361cdae6c76f99.author: Epictetus

7290a3cf509ff177.content: A true friend is the most precious of all possessions and the one we take the least thought about acquiring.
7290a3cf509ff177.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

4a76b53a533d012f.content: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
4a76b53a533d012f.author: Abraham Lincoln

ded94e9833690fd4.content: Friendship with oneself is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
ded94e9833690fd4.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

be2c16efa00accd8.content: Don't believe what your eyes are telling you. All they show is limitation. Look with your understanding, find out what you already know, and you'll see the way to fly.
be2c16efa00accd8.author: Richard Bach

cdb82507ea50b7aa.content: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.
cdb82507ea50b7aa.author: Brian Tracy

fdf43e28e655957e.content: To change one's life, start immediately, do it flamboyantly, no exceptions.
fdf43e28e655957e.author: William James

1c929cb93a267510.content: Before you can inspire with emotion, you must be swamped with it yourself. Before you can move their tears, your own must flow. To convince them, you must yourself believe.
1c929cb93a267510.author: Winston Churchill

07a23785ea16be55.content: First comes thought; then organization of that thought, into ideas and plans; then transformation of those plans into reality. The beginning, as you will observe, is in your imagination.
07a23785ea16be55.author: Napoleon Hill

b561b96a8d46239f.content: Through pride we are ever deceiving ourselves. But deep down below the surface of the average conscience a still, small voice says to us, something is out of tune.
b561b96a8d46239f.author: Carl Jung

28c9152bf5f74046.content: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
28c9152bf5f74046.author: Francis Bacon

99467e1e7fecbb0d.content: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
99467e1e7fecbb0d.author: Rumi

87c158e5c829ddf6.content: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
87c158e5c829ddf6.author: Mother Teresa

85ce7f4017a2e46d.content: Remembering a wrong is like carrying a burden on the mind.
85ce7f4017a2e46d.author: Buddha

d00a07405b45a097.content: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
d00a07405b45a097.author: Swami Vivekananda

cd5597fdf4a6f255.content: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.
cd5597fdf4a6f255.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

873ad6a12b30855e.content: Mind is everything: muscle, pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
873ad6a12b30855e.author: Paavo Nurmi

b96712aaeb5cc1e4.content: Cunning... is but the low mimic of wisdom.
b96712aaeb5cc1e4.author: Plato

a9a715447bcbc472.content: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
a9a715447bcbc472.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

1a106e5106deb2d6.content: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you. You may have a fresh start any moment you choose.
1a106e5106deb2d6.author: Mary Pickford

c36d6342f5e79c8e.content: In separateness lies the world's great misery, in compassion lies the world's true strength.
c36d6342f5e79c8e.author: Buddha

1f0a5e148bef64bd.content: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.
1f0a5e148bef64bd.author: Socrates

bcf35136d578a738.content: Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does.
bcf35136d578a738.author: Jane Austen

f5b77e41d846a960.content: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
f5b77e41d846a960.author: Epictetus

14b9792557f620fc.content: In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order.
14b9792557f620fc.author: Carl Jung

f54672f9146721c0.content: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it.
f54672f9146721c0.author: Colin Powell

393d32ced4067650.content: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
393d32ced4067650.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

b176a81cb63628e3.content: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
b176a81cb63628e3.author: Anatole France

98176f90af9df686.content: Good luck is another name for tenacity of purpose.
98176f90af9df686.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

5dd169dd4a67110c.content: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
5dd169dd4a67110c.author: Dale Carnegie

dcc6a7d487285e0e.content: The foot feels the foot when it feels the ground.
dcc6a7d487285e0e.author: Buddha

88866ba1978676fb.content: A subtle thought that is in error may yet give rise to fruitful inquiry that can establish truths of great value.
88866ba1978676fb.author: Isaac Asimov

1fb51226311a16cd.content: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.
1fb51226311a16cd.author: Leonardo da Vinci

232f5dd33a0f0e30.content: Hope arouses, as nothing else can arouse, a passion for the possible.
232f5dd33a0f0e30.author: William Sloane Coffin

f5bc8e7fdf37ed03.content: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
f5bc8e7fdf37ed03.author: Mark Twain

1de82b739c07408a.content: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
1de82b739c07408a.author: Buddha

875fe7f694c5a57e.content: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
875fe7f694c5a57e.author: Napoleon Hill
